name: buckaroo-pm/host-pcap
description: Buck wrapper for the host's libpcap
readme:
# host-pcap

Buck wrapper for the host's `pcap`.

To run the demo:

```bash=
buck run ./demo
```

versions.buck:
prebuilt_cxx_library(
  name = 'pcap',
  header_namespace = '',
  header_only = True,
  exported_linker_flags = [
    '-lpcap',
  ],
  visibility = [
    'PUBLIC',
  ],
)
